commun.welcome: Hi to you ! Here's how to use Terramite

touch.name: Click/Tap
touch.description: Click/Tap on a country to see the stones mined there.

zoom.name: Zoom
zoom.description: Zoom on the map to be able to click on a less visible country.

view.name: Discover
view.description: Discover the different deposits of each country in the world.
